onboarding_introduction_popover_title: {{userName}}, welcome to the OVHcloud Control Panel
onboarding_introduction_popover_extra: Your guide will remain available and accessible from the left-hand menu.
onboarding_walkme_popover_step1_title: How do I access my account?
onboarding_walkme_popover_step1_content: Access your account at any time by clicking on your name.
onboarding_walkme_popover_step2_title: How do I manage my account/information?
onboarding_walkme_popover_step2_content: Update your profile, payment methods, and support level. Access your bills, services and orders. View your messages, emails and contracts.
onboarding_walkme_popover_step3_content: Explore the full range of OVHcloud services. Expand your solution by incorporating additional, tailored services.
onboarding_walkme_popover_step4_content: Find partner sellers on our Marketplace, stay updated on the real-time status of our services, and calculate your carbon footprint. Need help? Access our how-to guides and help resources. Chat with us to get solutions, additional resources and answers to your queries.
onboarding_walkme_popover_step5_content: You can find all of your bills, payments in progress and credit notes in this section.
